get.description: Retrieves a specified bank account balance.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bank account.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'BankAccountBalance' object.

400.description: Bad Request

403.description: When bank account balance with specified id is not associated with authenticated client.

404.description: When bank account balance with specified id does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves a specified bank account.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'BankAccount' object.

400.description: Bad Request

403.description: When bank account with specified id is not associated with authenticated client.

404.description: When bank account with specified id does not exist.

get.description: Returns a list of bank accounts.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a list of 'BankAccount' objects.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the activity code to be updated.

post.description: Creates an activity code.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the activity code to be created.

400.description: Bad Request

get.description: Returns a list of files associated with a matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a paged collection of 'File' objects.

403.description: When the requested matter does not belong to the account making the request.

post.description: Uploads a new file for the specified matter.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a 'UploadFileInfo' object.

400.description: When the file name does not contain valid XML characters or an unsupported request is made.

get.description: Retrieves a specified file.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'File' object.

403.description: When the requested file does not belong to the account making the request.

404.description: When file with the specified id does not exist.

put.summary: Upload/update version or metadata of a file
put.description: Updates the metadata for a file or uploads a new version of the file

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a 'UploadFileInfo' object.

400.description: When the file name does not contain valid XML characters or an unsupported request is made.

404.description: When file or matter with the specified id does not exist.

patch.summary: Patch version or metadata of a file
patch.description: Updates the metadata for a file or uploads a new version of the file

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a 'UploadFileInfo' object.

404.description: When file or matter with the specified id does not exist.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the file to be deleted.

400.description: When the requested file does not belong to the specified matter.

403.description: When the requested file does not belong to the account making the request.

get.description: Retrieves the details of the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'Firm' object.

404.description: When firm does not exist.

post.description: Creates a firm for the current authenticated client and registers an existing user as a staff member and firm owner.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the firm to be created.

400.description: When staff user does not exist or is already associated with another firm.

put.description: Updates firm details for the current authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the firm to be updated.

404.description: When firm does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves a list of staff/user mappings in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns an array of one or more 'FirmUser' objects.

get.description: Retrieves a staff/user mapping (based on staff or user id parameter provided) in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'FirmUser' object.

put.description: Updates a staff/user mapping in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be updated.

400.description: When staff or user has not been provided.

403.description: When staff does not belong to the firm.

404.description: When 'FirmUser' does not exist.

delete.description:
Removes the user from the firm associated with the authenticated client.

The associated staff member is set as a former staff member and if they are a user, becomes a former user.

200.description: Success

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be deleted.

404.description: When 'FirmUser' object does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of staff members (filtered based on search parameters provided) in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description: email, name

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a paged collection of 'Staff' objects

post.description: Creates a staff member in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the staff member to be created.

400.description: When request is invalid

get.description: Retrieves a staff member (based on staff id parameter provided) in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'Staff' object

400.description: When staff id parameter invalid or not provided

404.description: When staff member does not exist

put.description: Updates a staff member in the firm associated with the authenticated client.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the staff member to be updated.

404.description: When staff member does not exist

delete.description:
Sets the staff member from the firm associated with the authenticated client as a former staff member.

The staff member is set as a former staff member and if they are a user, becomes a former user. User access is also disabled.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the staff member to be deleted.

404.description: When staff member does not exist

parameters.description: Timestamp in ticks. Use this to only get invoices which have been updated

200.description: Returns the invoices

parameters.name: matterId
parameters.description: Matter Id

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: Layout item Id

parameters.description: Matter item Id

requestBody.description: Data to merge into the existing layout

post.summary: Add a contact to a layout
post.description: Adds a new contact on a specified layout.

202.description: When request is accepted

404.description: When layout item with specified id does not exist on the matter.

get.description: Returns a list of matters.

parameters.name: MatterTypeId
parameters.description: Filter by matter type identifier.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: Filter by the contact identifier.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Filter by current status of the matter.

Possible values: Open, Pending, Closed, Deleted or Cancelled.

parameters.name: IsLead
parameters.description: Boolean flag to restrict search to 'Leads'.

parameters.name: UpdatedSince
parameters.description: Filter by matters updated since a specified time (.net ticks representation of the UTC datetime).

parameters.name: LastUpdated
parameters.description:
Deprecated, use updatedSince.

Filter by last updated date of matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a list of `Matter` objects.

post.description:
Creates a new matter.
            
Note: This endpoint can also be used to create a `Lead`.

When creating a `Lead` you MUST remember to set a valid lead specific `matterTypeId` field (see field description below for more details) and set the `isLead` field to true.

The `clientRole` and `otherSideRole` are optional and cannot be identical. They will be set to the default role(s) for the specified matter type - if not provided.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia `Link` object of the matter to be created.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made or a mandatory field - i.e. client, matter type, status - is not provided.

get.description: Retrieves a specified matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a `Matter` object.

403.description: When the authenticated account does not access to the matter.

404.description: When matter with specified id does not exist.

put.description:
Updates a specified matter.
            
The following actions are currently not supported:
            
- `matterTypeId` cannot be modified
            
- `clientIds` cannot be modified
            
- `otherSideIds` cannot be modified

- a lead cannot be converted back to a matter and vice versa

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia `Link` object of the matter to be updated.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

403.description: When the authenticated account does not access to the matter.

404.description: When matter with specified id does not exist.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia `Link` object of the matter to be deleted.

400.description: Bad Request

403.description: When the authenticated account does not access to the matter.

404.description: When matter with specified id does not exist.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'MatterRelationships' object.

404.description: When the specified matter or role group does not exist.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the relationship to be created.

400.description: When an invalid relationship is provided for the specified role.

404.description: When the specified matter or role does not exist.

get.description: Returns a relationship with a specified role in a matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'Relationship' object.

404.description: When the specified matter, role group or role (within the specified role group) does not exist.

put.description: Updates a specified relationship on a matter.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the relationship to be updated.

404.description: When the specified matter, role or relationship does not exist.

delete.summary: Remove relationship from a role in a matter.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the relationship to be deleted.

404.description: When matter, role or relationship does not exist.

get.description: Returns associated roles for a specified matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'MatterRoles' object.

404.description: When the specified matter does not exist.

post.description: Appends a new role in the specified matter.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the role to be created.

400.description: When an invalid role is provided for the specified matter.

404.description: When the specified matter does not exist.

get.description: Returns a role in a specified matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'Role' object.

404.description: When the specified matter does not exist.

put.description: Updates a specified role on a matter.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the role to be updated.

404.description: When the specified matter does not exist.

delete.description: Removes a specified role from a matter.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the role to be deleted.

404.description: When matter does not exist.

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of matter types based on search criteria.

Note: If no `Location` is provided, all matter types from all locations will be returned.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Searches for partial match on matter type name

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific location. In the US API this is the ANSI 2 letter state code (e.g. IL, NY). In the AU API this is shorthand state code (e.g. NSW, ACT, etc)

parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific category.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Return matter types by category type (i.e. MatterType or LeadType).
            
Possible values: Matter Type = 0, Lead Type = 1.

parameters.name: Deleted
parameters.description: Boolean field to restrict search to deleted matter types. Defaults to 'false'. Set to 'true' to search for deleted matter types only.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a paged collection of 'MatterTypeInfo' objects.

get.description: Retrieves a specified matter type.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'MatterType' object.

404.description: When matter type with specified id does not exist.

get.description: Returns a list of memos on the specified matter.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a list of 'Memo' objects.

post.summary: Create a memo on a matter
post.description: Creates a memo on the specified matter.

202.description: When request is successful. The memo has been accepted and will be created shortly.

400.description: Bad request.

get.description: Retrieves a specified memo.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns the specified memo.

404.description: When the specified memo does not exist.

202.description: When request is successful. The memo has been accepted and will be updated shortly.

400.description: Bad request.

404.description: When the specified memo does not exist.

202.description: When request is successful. The request has been accepted and the memo will be deleted shortly.

400.description: Bad request.

404.description: When the specified memo does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves a specified user. Only accessible using client credentials grant.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'User' object.

400.description: Bad Request

403.description:
When user with specified id is not associated with authenticated client.

When the request is not made using client credentials grant.

404.description: When user with specified id does not exist.

post.description:
Creates a user. Only accessible using client credentials grant.
            
Sends an email with a generated password if the password is missing.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'User' object.

202.description: Success

400.description: When user or password validation fails.

403.description: When the request is not made using client credentials grant.

404.description: When the webhook subscription is not found.

delete.description: Deletes and unsubscribes from the specified webhook subscription.

200.description: When request is successful. Deletes the webhook subscription.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

post.description:
Notifies a webhook subscription with a 'noop' event type.
            
Used for testing purposes.

200.description: When request is successful. Notifies the webhook subscription.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bank account.
Unique identifier of the bank account. This is the same id used for BankAccount.

balance.description: Total balance of the bank account.

contactBalances.description:
List of contact balances. If balances are stored by matter, not by contact, then there can be
a contact balance with no contact id. In this case, MatterBalances should be used instead.

matterBalances.description:
List of matter balances. A matter balance will be equal to the sum of all contact balances with
the same MatterId.

balance.description: Balance belonging to the specified contact and matter.
Balance belonging to the specified matter.

unpresentedChequesBalance.description:
Balance of the unpresented cheques for this matter. A cheque is considered 
unpresented if the related transaction has not been reconciled. If this balance is not zero,
some actions on the matter are restricted (e.g. closing or cancelling the matter).

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the activity.

updatedByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that last updated the activity.

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.
If set, rate type must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

isDeleted.description: True if the activity is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the activity.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.

If set, rateType must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

ActivityRateType.description:
The activity rate type.
    UseDefaultStaffRate = 0,
    OverrideRateForAllStaff = 1,
    OverrideRatePerStaff = 2

EntryType.description: The type of the fee (Fixed = 0, Time = 1).

versionId.description: Version id of the billing configuration.

amount.description:
The amount (currency).

Only applicable when BillingType is 'Fixed Fee', 'Fixed Fee per Apperance' or 'Time Based'.

contingencyAmount.description:
The contingency amount (percentage). 

Only applicable when BillingType is 'Contingency Percent'.

isUtbmsEnabled.description:
True if Uniform Task Based Management (UTBMS) is enabled for this matter.

Only supported in the US.

ledesFirmId.description:
The associated Legal Electronic Data Exchange Standard (LEDES) firm.

Only supported in the US.

ledesMatterId.description:
The associated Legal Electronic Data Exchange Standard (LEDES) matter.

Only supported in the US.

ledesClientMatterId.description:
The associated Legal Electronic Data Exchange Standard (LEDES) client matter.

Only supported in the US.

amount.description:
The amount (currency).

Only applicable when BillingType is 'Fixed Fee', 'Fixed Fee per Apperance', 'Contingency ($)' or 'Time Based'.

contingencyAmount.description:
The contingency amount (percentage). 

Only applicable when BillingType is 'Contingency Percent'.

disbursementAmount.description:
The disbursement amount (currency).

Only applicable when BillingType is 'Fixed Fee', 'Fixed Fee per Apperance', 'Contingency ($)' or 'Time Based'.

Only supported in the UK.

debtorIds.description: The matter debtors. Must be valid contact id(s) and a maximum of 3 debtors can be set.

True if Uniform Task Based Management (UTBMS) is enabled for this matter.

Only supported in the US.

ledesFirmId.description:

ledesMatterId.description:

ledesClientMatterId.description:
The associated Legal Electronic Data Exchange Standard (LEDES) client matter.

Only supported in the US.

rateSetId.description:
The RateSet Id.

Only supported in the UK.

BillingTypeEnum.description:
The billing type.

Possible values: None = 0, Fixed Fee = 1, Fixed Fee per Appearance = 2, Time Based = 3, Contingency Dollars = 4, Contingency Percent = 5, Not Billable = 6

TimekeeperClassificationType.description:
The associated Legal Electronic Data Exchange Standard (LEDES) classification type.

Possible values: Length6 = 0, Length2 = 1.

Only supported in the US.

fileName.description: Full name of the file including the file extension

folderId.description: Unique identifier of the folder to add the file to. If null it will be placed in the root folder

userId.description: Unique identifier of the file owner. If null it will fallback to the authenticated user

fileAdditionalData.description: Collection of KeyValuePair(string, string) to update File meta data.

dateCreated.description: The original datetime that the file was created. If null the current datetime will be used

fileId.description: Unique identifier of the requested file

expiry.description: Expiry date/time when the download link is no longer accessible

sizeBytes.description: Size of the requested file (in bytes)

fileName.description: Full name of the file including the file extension

folderId.description: Unique identifier of the folder to add the file to. If null it will be placed in the root folder

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user modifying the file. If null it will fallback to the authenticated user

fileAdditionalData.description: Collection of KeyValuePair(string, string) to update File meta data.

name.description: Name of the file, excluding file extension.

ownerId.description: Unique identifier of the staff member who created/uploaded this file.

to.description: The 'To' or recipients' email address (only applicable for email files).

from.description: The 'From' or sender's email address (only applicable for email files).

dateCreated.description: The original datetime that the file was created.

dateModified.description: The datetime that the file was last modified.

additionalData.description: Collection of file meta data as KeyValuePair(string, string).

parentId.description: Unique identifier of the parent folder

parentFolderId.description: Unique identifier of the parent folder

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user modifying the folder. If null it will fallback to the authenticated user

expiry.description: Expiry date/time when the upload link is no longer accessible

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the expense.

createdByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that created the expense.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

matterId.description: Unique identifier of the associated matter.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the expense.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

amount.description:
Total amount of the expense. Calculated as Price * Quantity.

This amount ignores GST (if applicable). See Billing.Expenses.Api.Shared.Resources.Expense.AmountExcTax and Billing.Expenses.Api.Shared.Resources.Expense.AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the expense has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 

Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

isDeleted.description: True if the expense is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the expense.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the expense.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the expense has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 

Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the fee.

matterId.description: Unique identifier of the associated matter.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

createdByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that created the fee.

lastUpdatedByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that updated the fee.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the fee.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.

Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

duration.description: The duration of the fee in minutes. This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

amount.description:
Total amount of the fee in dollars. Calculated using Rate and Duration depending on the fee type.

This amount includes tax depending on the TaxInclusive property. See Billing.Fees.Api.Shared.Resources.Fee.AmountExcTax and Billing.Fees.Api.Shared.Resources.Fee.AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax in dollars. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax in dollars. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

billableAmountExcTax.description:
Billable amount excluding tax in dollars. If fee is billable, value will be the same as AmountExcTax. If it's non-billable,
value will be 0.

If the fee is partially billable (i.e. has source items, some of which are billable and some not),
this value will contain the amount calculated from billable items only.

billableTax.description:
Billable tax in dollars. If fee is billable, value will be the same as Tax. If it's non-billable,
value will be 0.

If the fee is partially billable (i.e. has source items, some of which are billable
and some not), this value will contain the tax calculated from billable items only.
In all other cases, the value will be the same as Tax.

isDeleted.description: True if the fee is deleted.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the fee.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the fee.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

duration.description: The duration of the fee in minutes. This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.

Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the fee is invoiced externally.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

isBillable.description: True if the fee source item is billable.
True if the fee source item is billable.

fixedDiscount.description: The amount of fixed discount applied.

percentage.description: The amount of percentage discount applied.

id.description: The unique identifier of the invoice.

versionId.description: The unique identifier of the invoice version.

matterId.description: The unique identifier of the matter that the invoice belongs to.

lastUpdatedByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user that last updated the invoice.

issuedDate.description: The date the invoice has been issued.

dueDate.description: The date the invoice is due.

paidDate.description: The date the invoice was paid. This date is only available if the invoice is fully paid.

waived.description: True if the invoice is waived.

paid.description: Total amount paid on the invoice.

billed.description: Amount billed. This is the sum of all fees and expenses on the invoice, without tax.

total.description: Total amount for invoice, including tax and interest.

tax.description: Amount of Tax on the invoice.

interest.description:
Amount of interest. This is the total interest amount, not taking into account
what has been paid.

unpaidExcInterest.description:
Amount unpaid excluding interest. For invoices in interest, if this amount is zero,
it means that the principal has been fully paid, though there might still be unpaid interest.

feeTotal.description: All fees (written off + non written off).

expenseTotal.description: All expenses (written off + non written off).

id.description: Unique identifier for the item on a matter.

index.description: Zero based number of this item in the list.

visible.description: Boolean flag indicating if the item is visible.

subItems.description: List of child items associated with the item.

items.description: List of items on a matter.

contactId.description: Unique identifier for the layout contact.

description.description: Brief description of the layout design.

name.description: Name of the layout design field.

Type of the layout design field.
            
Possible values: 'Text','Combobox','Checkbox','DateTime','Role','Number'

possibleValues.description: List of possible values (e.g. for Combobox field).

itemId.description: Unique identifier for the layout item.

parentId.description: Unique identifier for the parent layout design.

clients.description: List of hypermedia links of 'Client' contacts associated with the matter.

otherSides.description: List of hypermedia links of 'OtherSide' contacts associated with the matter.

description.example: This is a brief description for the matter

status.description:
Current status of the matter.

Possible values: Open, Pending, Closed, Deleted or Cancelled.

clientCode.description:
Associates an external client code to this matter.

Only supported in AU and UK.

isMatterTemplate.description: Boolean flag indicating if the matter is a template.

isLead.description: Boolean flag indicating if the matter is a lead.

branchProviderId.description: Unique identifier of the associated branch provider.

externalSystemId.description: External system id for the matter.

matterTypeId.description:
Unique identifier of the matter type associated with the matter.
            
Matter types define what information can be saved to the matter, relevant to that area of law and state / location.
            
A pre-configured list of matter types can be obtained via the 'GET /mattertypes' API.
            
'Lead' matter types are different from the standard matter types used when creating a 'Matter'.
            
Use the 'Type' query parameter in the 'GET /mattertypes' API call to get 'Lead' specific matter types.

clientIds.description: List of 'Client' contact id's associated with the matter.

otherSideIds.description: List of 'OtherSide' contact id's associated with the matter.

branchId.description: Unique identifier of the associated branch.

branchProviderId.description: Unique identifier of the associated branch provider.

clientRole.description: 'Client' matter type representative option for the matter.

otherSideRole.description: 'OtherSide' matter type representative option for the matter.

description.example: This is a brief description for the matter

status.description:
Current status of matter.

Possible values: Open, Pending, Closed, Deleted or Cancelled.

dateOpened.description: Date when the matter was opened. This can be backdated if required.

clientCode.description:
Associates an external client code to this matter.

Only supported in AU and UK.

isLead.description: Optional boolean flag indicating if a 'Lead' is being created. This must be set to 'true' when creating a 'Lead'.

representatives.description: List of hypermedia links of the associated representatives.

representativeIds.description: List of associated representative contact ids.

representatives.description: List of hypermedia links of the associated representatives.

isClient.description: Boolean flag indicating if role belongs to a 'Client'.

isOtherSide.description: Boolean flag indicating if role belongs to an 'OtherSide'.

representativeIds.description: List of associated representative contact ids.

isMatterItemRequired.description: Boolean flag indicating if matter item is required.

id.description: Unique provider-specific identifier of the item.

subItems.description: List of sub items belonging to the item.

id.description: Unique identifier of the matter type.

category.description: Name of the category to which the matter type belongs.

representativeOptions.description: List of possible representative types for the matter type.

location.description: State to which the matter type belongs.

id.description: Unique identifier of the matter type.

category.description: Name of the category to which the matter type belongs.

representativeOptions.description: List of possible representative types for the matter type.

location.description: State to which the matter type belongs.

TypeCategory.description:
Name of the category type to which the matter type belongs (i.e. MatterType or LeadType).
            
Possible values: Matter Type = 0, Lead Type = 1.

id.description: The unique identifier of the memo.

matterId.description: The unique identifier of the matter.

text.description:
The text (content) of the memo.
            
In RTF (Rich Text Format).
text.example: There has been a recent update on this matter.

createdByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the memo.

lastUpdated.description: Date and time that the memo was last updated.

updatedByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user who last updated the memo.

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the memo is deleted (true if it is, false if not).

text.description:
The text (content) of the memo.
            
Supports plain-text and RTF.
text.example: There has been a recent update on this matter.

createdDateUtc.description:
Date that the memo was created.

Will default to the current date and time, if not supplied.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the matter stage was last updated.

MatterStage.description: Contains the current stage of the matter.

isDeleted.description: True when the stage is deleted.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the stage was last updated.

Stage.description: Contains information of a stage in a stage set.

id.description: Unique identifier of the stage set.

isDeleted.description: True when the stage set is deleted.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the stage set was last updated.

StageSet.description: Contains the stage set and stages information.

DocumentType.description:
Available document types: "File = 0", "FormTemplate = 1", "Memo = 2" 

The FormTemplate (1) document type is not currently supported for task document creation.

subject.description: The subject - a short description of the subtask.

isCompleted.description: True when the subtask is completed.

isDeleted.description: True when the subtask is deleted.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member creating or updating the subtask.

completedByStaffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member who completed the subtask.

isCompleted.description: True when the subtask is completed.

completedDate.description:
Completed date of the subtask. 
If not provided and IsCompleted is set to true, the current date will be used.

SubTaskDto.description: Data transfer object for a subtask.

assignees.description: The staff member(s) assigned to the task.

subTasks.description: The tasks associated to the task.

subject.description: The subject - a short description of the task.

note.example: Contract needs to be reviewed and discussed with John

dueDate.description: The due date of the task.

isCompleted.description: True when the task is completed.

isDeleted.description: True when the task is deleted.

duration.description: Duration of the task in ISO 8601 duration format.

isDeleted.description: True when the task document has been deleted.

documentId.description:
Unique identifier of the document (file or memo).

If a file, the type must be 0 (File). 

If a memo, the type must be 2 (Memo).

The FormTemplate (1) document type is not currently supported for task document creation.

TaskDocumentDto.description: Data transfer object for a task document.

matterId.description: Unique identifier of the matter associated to the task.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member creating or updating the task.

completedByStaffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member completing the task.

assigneeIds.description: Unique identifier(s) of the associated staff member(s) assigned to the task.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the task.

note.example: Contract needs to be reviewed and discussed with John

isCompleted.description: True when the task is completed.

duration.description: Duration of the task in ISO 8601 duration format.

password.description:
Password for the user.

Password must include atleast one lowercase character, uppercase character, numeric character as well as a special character.

accountId.description: Unique identifier of the associated account.

name.description: Name or description of the subscription.
name.example: Listen to matter and contact changes

eventTypes.description: The event types that the webhook subscription is subscribed to.

eventNotificationUrl.description: The uri to notify when an event has occurred.

updatedDateUtc.description: The webhook subscription last updated date.

key.description: Unique key used for creating signature header in webhook notification requests.

name.description: Name or description of the webhook subscription.
name.example: Listen to matter and contact changes

eventTypes.description: The event types that the webhook subscription should be subscribed to.

eventNotificationUrl.description: The uri to notify when an event has occurred.
